title: Ascentage Pharma Announces Global Registrational Phase III Study of Olverembatinib in First-Line Treatment of Ph+ ALL Cleared by US FDA and EMA
description:
ROCKVILLE, Md. and SUZHOU, China, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Ascentage Pharma Group International
 (NASDAQ: AAPG; HKEX: 6855), a global, commercial stage, integrated biopharmaceutical company engaged in the discovery, development and commercialization…
